Proper care will ensure the longevity of this chair for years to come. ) [consfeatures] => Array ( [0] => ) [spoinfo] => Array ( [0] => ) [additionalinfo] => Array ( [0] => The Sylvester Chaise Lounge by Cattelan Italia features black leather upholstery and chrome accents. Made in Italy, this lounge has a sleek, versatile design with eye-catching, artistic stitching that complements the deep curves of the frame. The ergonomic design of the frame supports the natural curve of your spine, and the chaise has discreet wheels to enable easy movement to the most comfortable spot in your home.
